verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man שִׂ֥ים <WH7760> set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> thy face אֶל־ <WH413> toward הָרֵ֣י <WH2022> toward the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> and prophesy אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> against

וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> And say הָרֵי֙ <WH2022> Ye mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְ֠הוִה <WH3069> GOD לֶהָרִ֨ים <WH2022> to the mountains וְלַגְּבָע֜וֹת <WH1389> and to the hills לָאֲפִיקִ֣ים <WH650> to the rivers [וְלַגֵּאָיֹת כ] (וְלַגֵּאָיֹ֗ות <WH1516> valley ק) הִנְנִ֨י <WH2009> Behold אֲנִ֜י <WH589> Myself מֵבִ֤יא <WH935> Behold I [even] I will bring עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> and חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> a sword וְאִבַּדְתִּ֖י <WH6> upon you and I will destroy בָּמֽוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1116> your high places

וְנָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <WH8074> shall be desolate מִזְבְּח֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4196> And your altars וְנִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <WH7665> shall be broken חַמָּֽנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH2553> and your images וְהִפַּלְתִּי֙ <WH5307> and I will cast down חַלְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH2491> your slain לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> [men] before גִּלּוּלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1544> your idols

וְנָתַתִּ֗י <WH5414> And I will lay אֶת־ <WH853> פִּגְרֵי֙ <WH6297> the dead carcases בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1544> their idols וְזֵרִיתִי֙ <WH2219> and I will scatter אֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמ֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6106> your bones סְבִיב֖וֹת <WH5439> round about מִזְבְּחוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH4196> your altars

בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all מוֹשְׁב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4186> In all your dwellingplaces הֶעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> the cities תֶּחֱרַ֔בְנָה <WH2717> shall be laid waste וְהַבָּמ֖וֹת <WH1116> and the high places תִּישָׁ֑מְנָה <WH3456> shall be desolate לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> because of יֶחֶרְב֨וּ <WH2717> may be laid waste וְיֶאְשְׁמ֜וּ <WH816> and made desolate מִזְבְּחֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH4196> that your altars וְנִשְׁבְּר֤וּ <WH7665> may be broken וְנִשְׁבְּתוּ֙ <WH7673> and cease גִּלּ֣וּלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1544> and your idols וְנִגְדְּעוּ֙ <WH1438> may be cut down חַמָּ֣נֵיכֶ֔ם <WH2553> and your images וְנִמְח֖וּ <WH4229> may be abolished מַעֲשֵׂיכֶֽם׃ <WH4639> and your works

וְנָפַ֥ל <WH5307> shall fall חָלָ֖ל <WH2491> And the slain בְּתֽוֹכְכֶ֑ם <WH8432> in the midst וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> of you and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

וְהוֹתַרְתִּ֗י <WH3498> Yet will I leave a remnant בִּהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> will have לָכֶ֛ם פְּלִ֥יטֵי <WH6412> that ye may have [some] that shall escape חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> the sword בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> among the nations בְּהִזָּרֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH2219> when ye shall be scattered בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> through the countries

וְזָכְר֨וּ <WH2142> of you shall remember פְלִֽיטֵיכֶ֜ם <WH6412> And they that escape אוֹתִ֗י <WH853> בַּגּוֹיִם֮ <WH1471> me among the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to which נִשְׁבּוּ־ <WH7617> whither they shall be carried captives שָׁם֒ <WH8033> in it אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> how נִשְׁבַּ֜רְתִּי <WH7665> because I am broken אֶת־ <WH853> לִבָּ֣ם <WH3820> heart הַזּוֹנֶ֗ה <WH2181> with their whorish אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which סָר֙ <WH5493> which hath departed מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> and וְאֵת֙ <WH854> and by עֵֽינֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5869> from me and with their eyes הַזֹּנ֕וֹת <WH2181> which go a whoring אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after גִּלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1544> their idols וְנָקֹ֙טּוּ֙ <WH6962> and they shall lothe בִּפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> themselves אֶל־ <WH413> for הָֽרָעוֹת֙ <WH7451> for the evils אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> which they have committed לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> for all תּוֹעֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8441> in all their abominations

וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> And they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD לֹ֤א <WH3808> not אֶל־ <WH413> in חִנָּם֙ <WH2600> in vain דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> [and that] I have not said לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> that I would do לָהֶ֖ם הָרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> this evil הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise פ

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3068> GOD הַכֵּ֨ה <WH5221> Smite בְכַפְּךָ֜ <WH3709> with thine hand וּרְקַ֤ע <WH7554> and stamp בְּרַגְלְךָ֙ <WH7272> with thy foot וֶֽאֱמָר־ <WH559> and say אָ֔ח <WH253> Alas אֶ֛ל <WH413> because כָּל־ <WH3605> of all תּוֹעֲב֥וֹת <WH8441> abominations רָע֖וֹת <WH7451> for all the evil בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֗ר <WH834> which בַּחֶ֛רֶב <WH2719> by the sword בָּרָעָ֥ב <WH7458> by the famine וּבַדֶּ֖בֶר <WH1698> and by the pestilence יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <WH5307> for they shall fall

הָרָח֞וֹק <WH7350> He that is far off בַּדֶּ֣בֶר <WH1698> of the pestilence יָמ֗וּת <WH4191> shall die וְהַקָּרוֹב֙ <WH7138> and he that is near בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יִפּ֔וֹל <WH5307> shall fall וְהַנִּשְׁאָר֙ <WH7604> and he that remaineth וְהַנָּצ֔וּר <WH5341> and is besieged בָּרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> by the famine יָמ֑וּת <WH4191> shall die וְכִלֵּיתִ֥י <WH3615> thus will I accomplish חֲמָתִ֖י <WH2534> my fury בָּֽם׃

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <WH3045> Then shall ye know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בִּֽהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> become חַלְלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH2491> when their slain בְּתוֹךְ֙ <WH8432> [men] shall be among גִּלּ֣וּלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1544> their idols סְבִיב֖וֹת <WH5439> round about מִזְבְּחֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH4196> their altars אֶל֩ <WH413> on כָּל־ <WH3605> every גִּבְעָ֨ה <WH1389> hill רָמָ֜ה <WH7311> upon every high בְּכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> all רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> in all the tops הֶהָרִ֗ים <WH2022> of the mountains וְתַ֨חַת <WH8478> under כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֤ץ <WH6086> tree רַֽעֲנָן֙ <WH7488> and under every green וְתַ֙חַת֙ <WH8478> and under כָּל־ <WH3605> every אֵלָ֣ה <WH424> oak עֲבֻתָּ֔ה <WH5687> and under every thick מְק֗וֹם <WH4725> the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> they נָֽתְנוּ־ <WH5414> where they did offer שָׁם֙ <WH8033> in it רֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <WH5207> sweet לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all גִּלּוּלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1544> to all their idols

וְנָטִ֤יתִי <WH5186> So will I stretch out אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִי֙ <WH3027> my hand עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> against וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> upon them and make אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> the land שְׁמָמָ֤ה <WH8077> desolate וּמְשַׁמָּה֙ <WH4923> yea more desolate מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> than the wilderness דִּבְלָ֔תָה <WH1689> toward Diblath בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מוֹשְׁבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH4186> in all their habitations וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD פ
